## Vectors in R

```{r}
# Create vector
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

marmots
```

```{r}
class(marmots)
```

```{r}
# numeric vector
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5)

pika
```

```{r}
# check class
class(pika)
```

If values should be integers, add L after value

```{r}
# create integer vector
bear <- c(20L, 3L, 5L, 18L, 23L)

# check class
class(bear)
```

### \* Numbers can be stored in different ways: \*

Floats are numbers with decimals (class numeric). Integers are numbers without decimals (class integer)

## Vector Math & Dot Product

```{r}
# create two vectors
ringtail <- c(4.3, 8.9, 2.6, 7.1)
fox <- c(9.0, 12.5, 5.4, 10.9)

# addition
ringtail + fox
```

```{r}
# subtraction
fox - ringtail
```

```{r}
# scalar multiply
67 * ringtail
```

### Special dot product notation

```{r}
# dot product
ringtail %*% fox
```
